import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useState } from 'react' import './Auth.css' const Auth = () => { const [IsSignUp, setSignUp] = useState(false); return (

{IsSignUp ? "SignUp" : "Login"}

{IsSignUp &&
}
{IsSignUp && }
setSignUp((prev)=>(!prev))}> {IsSignUp ? "Already Have an Account! Login":"Don't Have an account! SignUp"}
) } export default Auth
